title: HoP 134 - Balancing Acts - Arabic Ethical Literature
itunes:title: HoP 134 - Balancing Acts - Arabic Ethical Literature
description: Drawing on Galen and Aristotle, philosophers from al-Kindi to Miskawayh compose ethical works designed us to achieve health in soul, as well as body.
